channel.title: CVE Feed for creativeinteractivemedia -- Transition Slider – Responsive Image Slider and Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for creativeinteractivemedia -- Transition Slider – Responsive Image Slider and Gallery

item.title: CVE-2024-37215|2024-07-22T10:27:45.163Z -- creativeinteractivemedia -- transition%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20image%20slider%20and%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in creativeinteractivemedia Transition Slider – Responsive Image Slider and Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Transition Slider – Responsive Image Slider and Gallery: from n/a through 2.20.3.
